description: Details of remediation scheme pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission ref: 202373FUL dated 24/09/2020 for: Construction of a two storey dwelling house (following demolition of existing garage)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to the remediation scheme pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission ref: 202373FUL dated 24/09/2020, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and did not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policy 5.21 of Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and DEFRA and the Environment Agency's 'Model Procedures for the Management of Land Contamination, CLR 11'.
